about_the_game:
"Pathfinder RPG - Pathfinder Flip-Mat - Forest Fire


A World on Fire!
Pathfinder Flip-Mat: Forest Fire features two different scenes of fiery destruction to challenge even the most stout-hearted or foolhardy adventurer! One map shows flames roiling across a remote forested highland, while the other map depicts a small lakeside settlement threatened on all sides by an approaching conflagration.
Get to the best parts of the game faster with Pathfinder Flip-Mat: Forest Fire, and be ready next time your players brave the flames!

 NOTE: This product has been made specifically for the Pathfinder ruleset, but can be used for 5E, Starfinder, or any ruleset supported by Fantasy Grounds

This product is not a PDF or accessible outside of Fantasy Grounds. It has been lovingly converted for use within Fantasy Grounds and Features the Following additions:
  • All maps resized and set up with a preset grid to make combats easy to manage
  • All the images and handouts from the book available to share with your players as you need them
"
